(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.lock$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.scssc$
^images/cookie-consent\.png$
^src/bundle\.js$
^\.github/
^examples/example-6-location\.html$
